main.name: Joshua Olorunnipa
main.description: Building web and mobile apps in JavaScript, React and React Native
main.bio: I am a web developer whose specialty is in front end development with React and NextJS. I also have experience in using MongoDB as a database, Jest for testing and Node as a server-side language. I have also worked with React Native for building hybrid mobile apps for both android and iOS devices. I love learning new technologies and growing my knowledge by making the best out of the resources available to me. I am currently I'm working on a range of freelance projects and seeking new opportunities. Outside software development and coding, I love music, traveling, taking on new adventures, playing video games.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, start a project or anything else.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That [name] must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
